items.title: Want to Live Longer? Science Says Sleep ‘Regularity’ Is More Impactful Than Sleep Duration
items.description: How many hours of sleep you get certainly matters, but research shows when you get those hours matters even more.

items.title: Despite Popular Trends, Neuroscience Says You Don’t Really Need to Be Bored More Often
items.description: The idea that we need more boredom in our overstimulated lives is popular right now. One neuroscientist is calling B.S. on it.

items.description: The leadership lesson here goes beyond airlines.

items.title: It Turns Out, AI Agents Can’t Replace Experienced Humans
items.description: Not now, and I’m willing to bet not ever. Here’s why.

items.title: 4 of the Best Industries for Starting a Business in 2026
